articles.description: Southampton could be on the brink of signing a “superstar” this summer as Ralph Hasenhuttl looks to fix a problem position at the club.
articles.content:
Southampton target Gavin Bazunu is set to become a future “superstar”, according to talkSPORT reporter Alex Crook.
The Manchester City shot-stopper is yet to play in the Premier League, but that cou… [+2124 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Walker
articles.title: Everton have blown £530m on an underperforming team... it's no wonder Farhad Moshiri is apologising - Daily Mail
articles.description: After a miserable season, which saw the Toffees survive in the top flight by the skin of their teeth, owner Farhad Moshiri has written to supporters to apologise and admit to wasting a pile of cash.
articles.content:
Everton owner Farhad Moshiri is like a man who has woken from the mother of all benders and is now counting the cost of his excess.
After a miserable season, which saw the Toffees survive in the top… [+9681 chars]
